title: The Fell locomotive
creator_credit: Peter De Normanville, Roy Harris and Shell Film Unit
brief_description: A description of a new locomotive being produced in England. This is the first completely diesel engine to be evolved and an entirely new method of transmitting power to the wheels is incorporated in it. The film illustrates the advantages it has over steam, electric and diesel electric locomotives.
